page.title: 15Games and Leisure
page.content: In our school the favourite game for boys is{football.}Being a very old building, we have no grass and so we've had to learn how to be very careful when we play. Each summer we enter a 5-a-side team in the Holywell First School Fayre.Painted on our yard is a {hopscotch}game which the girls enjoy, although they spend most of their time doing handstands against the wall. In Seaton Delaval there are two{parks with swings and slides, tennis courts and bowling greens. There are two{playing fields}for}local football teams, one of which is also used as a cricket field. There are no public{swimming}baths in Seaton Delaval, but our 5th years go swimming once a week to Astley High School where there is a learner pool and a swimming teacher, Mrs. Golightly.
